title: Lake Mead Area Issued Weather Alert Over 'Hazardous' Conditions
description: A dense fog advisory has been issued by the NWS for Lake Mead and nearby areas.
content:
A dense fog advisory has been issued by the NWS for Lake Mead and nearby areas.
This story appeared on newsweek.com, 2026-01-02 12:59:07.
de: Lake Mead-Gebiet gab Wetterwarnung wegen „gefährlicher“ Bedingungen heraus. Die NWS hat für Lake Mead und die umliegenden Gebiete eine Warnung vor dichtem Nebel herausgegeben.
en: Lake Mead Area Issued Weather Alert Over 'Hazardous' Conditions. A dense fog advisory has been issued by the NWS for Lake Mead and nearby areas.
la: Area lacus Mead Datum Tempestas erecti super 'Ancipites' Conditiones. Nebula densa consilium a NWS ad lacum Mead et areas adiacentes edita est.

title: Delhi engulfed in dense fog as IMD issues Orange Alert: How cold will it get tomorrow?
description: Dense fog covered Delhi as New Year celebrations began, with temperatures expected to dip to 9°C. IMD has issued an orange alert, warning of cold wave conditions, poor visibility, and possible light rain.
content: New Year celebrations have begun in the national capital as dense fog covered large parts of Delhi, making the weather extremely cold. The chill is expected to increase further on Friday (January 2),… [+1885 chars]
de: Delhi ist in dichten Nebel gehüllt, als das IMD den Orange Alert herausgibt: Wie kalt wird es morgen? Zu Beginn der Neujahrsfeierlichkeiten war Delhi von dichtem Nebel bedeckt und die Temperaturen dürften auf 9 °C sinken. Das IMD hat eine orangefarbene Warnung herausgegeben, die vor Kältewellen, schlechter Sicht und möglichem leichten Regen warnt.
en: Delhi engulfed in dense fog as IMD issues Orange Alert: How cold will it get tomorrow?. Dense fog covered Delhi as New Year celebrations began, with temperatures expected to dip to 9°C. IMD has issued an orange alert, warning of cold wave conditions, poor visibility, and possible light rain.
la: Delhi nebula densa submersa est ut IMD exit Aureum erecti: Quomodo frigus cras erit?. Nebula densa Delhi obtexit sicut celebrationes Novus Annus incepit, cum temperaturis expectatis tinguere usque ad 9°C. IMD aureum intentum edidit, monitum aquae frigidae condiciones, visibilis pauper, et pluviae levis possibile.

title: IMD issues 'yellow' alert for dense fog in Delhi on Saturday; air quality improves to 'poor'

title: GRAP III curbs lifted in Delhi-NCR as AQI improves, likely to slip back to ‘Very Poor’ next week
description: Delhi’s average AQI dropped sharply to 236 on Friday from Thursday’s 380, prompting CAQM to revoke GRAP Stage III curbs even as IMD issued a yellow alert for fog and warned of possible deterioration from Sunday.
content: Delhi saw a significant improvement in the air quality on Friday with the city recording an average Air Quality Index (AQI) of 236 in the Poor category, a sharp drop from Thursdays 380 in the Very Po… [+2158 chars]
de: Die GRAP-III-Einschränkungen wurden in Delhi-NCR aufgehoben, da sich der AQI verbessert und voraussichtlich nächste Woche wieder auf „Sehr schlecht“ zurückfallen wird. Delhis durchschnittlicher AQI sank am Freitag stark auf 236 von 380 am Donnerstag, was CAQM dazu veranlasste, die GRAP-Stufe-III-Bordsteine ​​aufzuheben, obwohl das IMD eine gelbe Warnung wegen Nebel ausgab und vor einer möglichen Verschlechterung ab Sonntag warnte.
en: GRAP III curbs lifted in Delhi-NCR as AQI improves, likely to slip back to ‘Very Poor’ next week. Delhi’s average AQI dropped sharply to 236 on Friday from Thursday’s 380, prompting CAQM to revoke GRAP Stage III curbs even as IMD issued a yellow alert for fog and warned of possible deterioration from Sunday.
la: GRAP III in Delhi-NCR frena levata ut AQI melioratur, verisimile est relabi ad 'Plurimum Pauperem' sequenti hebdomade. Mediocris Delhi AQI acriter in 236 Veneris die Veneris ab 380, monens CAQM ad revocandum GRAP Scaena III cohibet etiam sicut IMD in nebula croceum vigilans edixit et de corruptione possibilis a Dominica admonitus est.

title: Flights cancelled at Dublin Airport and school reopenings under threat as Arctic blast to bring snow, ice and lows of -4C
description: Ireland is set for an Arctic blast as ­temperatures will sink close to -4C over the weekend – with some northern areas facing snow, ice, freezing fog and heavy frost.
content:
Five flights cancelled between Dublin Airport and Amsterdam
Status Yellow Snow-Ice warning for Cavan, Donegal, Monaghan, Connacht, Louth
Status Yellow Low Temperature/Ice warning for Munster, Carlo… [+5919 chars]
de: Flüge am Flughafen Dublin wurden gestrichen und die Wiedereröffnung von Schulen ist gefährdet, da der Sturm in der Arktis Schnee, Eis und Tiefsttemperaturen von -4 °C mit sich bringt. Irland steht vor einer arktischen Explosion, da die Temperaturen am Wochenende auf fast -4 °C sinken werden – wobei einige nördliche Gebiete mit Schnee, Eis, gefrierendem Nebel und starkem Frost konfrontiert sind.
en: Flights cancelled at Dublin Airport and school reopenings under threat as Arctic blast to bring snow, ice and lows of -4C. Ireland is set for an Arctic blast as ­temperatures will sink close to -4C over the weekend – with some northern areas facing snow, ice, freezing fog and heavy frost.
la: Volatus in Dublin Airport cassantur et scholae refricationes sub comminatione quasi inspiratione arctico ad nives, glaciem et -4C adducunt. Hibernia pro flatu arctico ponitur, sicut temperaturas prope 4C super volutpat vestibulum descendet - cum nonnullis locis septentrionalibus spectantibus nix, glacies, nebula et gelu gravis.
